Licenses of external components

This page describes all the external Java libraries used by Audiveris, and notably their related open source license.

Libraries used at run-time are gathered in folder dev/externals and those used only at build time are gathered in folder dev/tools.

Runtime libraries

BSAF

Better Swing Application Framework

Framework to help handle the life cycle of a Swing application

GNU Lesser General Public Licence (LGPL)

http://kenai.com/projects/bsaf/pages/Home

  • bsaf-1.9.1.jar

Crystal Project Icons

Collection of icons (subset)

GNU Lesser General Public Licence (LGPL)

http://www.everaldo.com

  • crystal-icons.jar

Event Bus

Used as a bus for all user-related events

Apache V2.0

http://eventbus.org/

  • eventbus-1.4.jar

iText

Used for writing PDF files

GNU Affero General Public License

http://itextpdf.com/

  • iText-5.0.4.jar

JAI

Java Advanced Imaging

Used for some image processing

Sun Binary Code License

http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/current-142188.html

  • clibwrapper_jiio.jar
  • jai_codec.jar
  • jai_core.jar
  • jai_imageio.jar
  • mlibwrapper_jai.jar

JAMA

Java Matrix Package

Basic linear algebra package for Java

Public Domain

http://math.nist.gov/javanumerics/jama/

  • Jama-1.0.2.jar

JavaCPP

Access to native C++ from Java (used by TessBridge)

GNU General Public License (GPL) V2

http://code.google.com/p/javacpp/

  • javacpp.jar

JCIP

Java Concurrency In Practice annotations

Source annotations for describing thread-safety policies

Creative Commons Attribution License

http://jcip.net/annotations/

  • jcip-annotations.jar

JFreechart

Java chart library

GNU Lesser General Public Licence (LGPL)

http://www.jfree.org/jfreechart/

  • jcommon-1.0.16.jar
  • jfreechart-1.0.13.jar

JGoodies

JGoodies Looks & JGoodies Forms

Java user interface on top of Swing

BSD open source license

http://www.jgoodies.com/

  • jgoodies-common-1.6.0.jar
  • jgoodies-forms-1.7.1.jar
  • jgoodies-looks-2.5.3.jar

ProxyMusic

Mapping between Java and MusicXML

GNU Lesser General Public Licence (LGPL)

http://proxymusic.kenai.com/

  • proxymusic-2.0.jar

Tesseract

TessBridge

(Java bridge to) Tesseract OCR V3

Apache License 2.0

http://code.google.com/p/tesseract-ocr/

  • tesseract-3.jar

Build time libraries

ant-contrib

Ant-Contrib tasks

Collection of tasks for Apache Ant

Apache Software License

http://ant-contrib.sourceforge.net/

  • ant-contrib-1.0b3.jar

ant-dotnet

Ant tasks for .Net

Apache Software License

http://ant-contrib.sourceforge.net/

  • ant-dotnet-1.1.jar

JUnit

Resources for test driven development

JUnit Common Public License v1.0

http://www.junit.org/

  • junit-4.7

UMLet

Free UML Tool for Fast UML Diagrams

GNU General Public License

http://www.umlet.com/

  • umlet.jar
